name: Trash Destroyer (Vynokris)
description:
Trash Defender

This project is a small tower defense game where you try your hardest to destroy all incoming trash before it ends up in the ocean.

You have access to 4 different weapons that shoot, burn, freeze and blow up all the trash pieces travelling on the conveyor belts.

This game has been developped by a team of 3 programmers over the course of a few weeks
